name: Berserker
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Berserkers leap to the nearest enemy. Berserkers have a chance to hit all units in a cone in front of them with their attacks

name: Lunar
desc: Moonlight transforms unit durability into a win condition for team comps that are built with drawn out battles in mind.
stats: Every 7 seconds, your team gains 15% Critical Strike Chance, 15% Critical Strike Damage, and 15% Spell Power. (Stacks up to 4 times)

name: Crystal
desc: Crystal Champions have a maximum amount of damage they can take from a single hit.

name: Electric
desc: Electric Champions shock nearby enemies whenever they deal or receive a critical strike

name: Woodland
stats: At the start of combat, a random Woodland Champion makes a copy of themselves

name: Inferno
desc: Inferno spell damage and critical strikes burns the ground beneath the target, dealing a percent of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 4 seconds
stats: 70% Damage, Hexes that light on fire: 1
150% Damage, Hexes that light on fire: 3
250% Damage, Hexes that light on fire: 5

name: Light
desc: When a Light Champion dies, all other Light Champions gain Attack Speed and are healed for 20% of their Maximum Health

name: Mage
desc: Mages have a chance on cast to instead Doublecast

name: Mountain
stats: At the start of combat, a random ally gains a 1500 health Stoneshield

name: Ocean
desc: All allies restore mana every 4 seconds

name: Poison
stats: Poison Champions apply Neurotoxin when they deal damage, increasing the target's mana cost by 33%

name: Predator
stats: Predators instantly kill enemies they damage who are below 25% health

name: Assassin
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.
stats: +70% Critical Strike Damage & +10% Critical Strike Chance
+210% Critical Strike Damage & +20% Critical Strike Chance

name: Blademaster
desc: Blademaster Basic Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

name: Glacial
desc: Basic Attacks from Glacials have 25% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds, bonus Magic Damage on stun.

name: Mystic
desc: All allies gain increased Magic Resist

name: Ranger
desc: Every 3 seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

name: Shadow
desc: Shadow units deal increased damage for 6 seconds at combat start, refreshed on takedown.

name: Soulbound
stats: The first Soulbound unit to die in a round will instead enter the Spirit Realm, becoming untargetable and continuing to fight as long as another Soulbound unit is alive.

name: Steel
desc: Steel Champions gain damage immunity for a few seconds when they are reduced below 50% health

name: Summoner
desc: Summoned units have increased health and duration
